properties.description: This is to implement pipeline with generic dataset
This pipeline will execute incremental pipeline

activities.name: Fetch the latest timestamp from datatbase

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as RecordDate from saleslt.customer;

dependsOn.activity: Fetch the latest timestamp from datatbase

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from saleslt.customer where ModifiedDate >''',activity('Get Highwatermark Date').output.firstRow.Prop_0,''' AND ModifiedDate <=''',activity('Fetch the latest timestamp from datatbase').output.firstRow.RecordDate,'''')
@concat('select ''' ,activity('Fetch the latest timestamp from datatbase').output.firstRow.RecordDate , ''' from saleslt.customer where customerid=1')

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as RecordCount from saleslt.customer;
select count(*) as ProductCount from saleslt.product;
select count(*) as RecordCount from saleslt.customer;
